DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety autologous transplantation Adipose Tissue derive Mesenchymal stem cell ( MSCs ) patient lumbar intervertebral disc degeneration .
DOC.brief_title: Autologous Adipose Tissue Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells Transplantation Patient With Lumbar Intervertebral Disc Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Subjects understand sign consent form study Age :1970 , male female Have chronic low back pain least 1 year Have fail 1 year nonoperative low back pain management Have degenerate intervertebral disc T2weighted MR image confirm positive discography Have significant lumbar instability degenerate intervertebral disc Have significant lumbar herniated intervertebral disc Women pregnant breast feed plan become pregnant study History current evidence alcohol drug abuse recreational user illicit drug prescription medication Serious preexist medical condition like Cardiovascular Diseases , Renal Diseases , Liver Diseases , Endocrine Diseases , Cancer Diabetes Mellitus Participation another clinical trial treatment different investigational product within 30 day prior inclusion study Other pathologic condition circumstance difficult participation study accord medical criterion
